summary_md: Portugal, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 22,479 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 2.42% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 6.38% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 82.28 years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 85.80% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's share of global exports is 46.48% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Portugal's economy is characterized by a GDP per capita of 22,479 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), and a share of global exports at 46.48% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market shows an unemployment rate of 6.38% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), suggesting a relatively stable employment environment.
sections.digital_md: With an internet usage rate of 85.80% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), Portugal demonstrates a growing digital presence.
sections.health_env_md: Portugal's health environment is reflected in an average life expectancy of 82.28 years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN).
